lottery_not_deployed:
The lottery contracts are not deployed to the detected network.
Try Matic Mumbai Testnet.
connect_to_see_tickets: Connect to a wallet to see your tickets
search_by_draw: Enter the draw number from 1 to
input_out_of_range: Please enter a draw number in the range
connect_to_see_more: Connect to a wallet to learn more
please_confirm_transaction: Please confirm the purchase of the ticket in your wallet
confirm_purchase: Confirm the purchase in your wallet
date_time_draw: Date and time of the draw
enter_new_admin: Enter the address of the new admin. The current address will be invalid
enter_new_randomness: Enter the address of the Randomness contract
enter_new_lottery_fee: Введите новый размер коммиссии в процентах
enter_lottery_to_delete: Enter the address of the lottery you want to delete
enter_new_duration: Change the number of minutes between draws
date_first_draw: Date and time of the first draw
enter_to_deposit: Enter the amount you want to deposit
enter_to_withdraw: Enter the amount you want to withdraw
only_possible_to_start_drawing: * It is only possible to start the manual drawing after
ticket_sales_close_5: Ticket sales close 5 minutes before the draw. You can buy a ticket as soon as a new lottery draw starts.
enter_to_withdraw_link: Enter the amount of LINK you want to withdraw
enter_new_initial_jackpot: Enter the new minimum jackpot value
nxtlottery_delivers_decentralised: NxtLottery offers decentralised, open and fair lottery using next-generation on-chain randomness.
our_smart_contracts_are_verified: Our smart contracts are verified and open source. They eliminate the risk of manipulation by third parties. Trust and transparency are core to NxtLottery.
polygon_is_a_decentralised: A decentralised Ethereum scaling platform that enables developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps with low transaction fees without ever sacrificing on security.
automation_enables_conditional: Enables conditional execution of smart contracts functions through a reliable and decentralized automation platform with a use of external network of node operators.
verifiable_random_function_is: A provably fair and verifiable random number generator (RNG) that enables smart contracts to access random values without compromising security or usability.
three_classic_lottery: Three classic lottery games with simple rules
players_choose_any_combinations: Players choose any combination of numbers from a specific set
prizes_are_won_based_on_how: Prizes are won based on how many of your chosen numbers match the winning numbers
if_a_player_matches_all: If a player matches all numbers, he will win the guaranteed jackpot
draw_is_rescheduled: The draw only happens if at least one ticket is sold, otherwise the draw is rescheduled.
